page.title: 18The Evesham Journal.
page.content: Mr.Martin,the{Editor}of the{Evesham {Journal newspaper,}had been been working on the Journal before he was editor. First of all he was on the sportspage. Then he went to report on council meetings. He went on to be Deputy Editor and then he was the real Editor. He has got 25{people working {for him}they are The Deputy Editor, Sports Editor, News Editor, six reporters, two photographers and office staff. The Journal has been going for{l25 years.}It used to only have 4{pages}but now it has got 72. The{biggest news story recently}was when a local building firm went bankrupt and the firm collapsed and many people lost their jobs. The Editor thinks the{biggest news to come in future Journals will be about the Evesham by-pass.{41,000 copies}of the paper are printed weekly by computer.
